err.msg: Internal error #%d. Please contact Avertec Support.\n
err.doc: The internal data representation for parasitic element is unconsistent. Please contact Avertec Support.

err.msg: There is too many different format of file opened.\n
err.doc: This is a very particular case where there is more than 16 differents format for input files. Please use less differents file format.
Allowed units for RCN_CACHESIZE are "kb", "mb" or "gb". See related documentation for more information.
